item.title: Workflow for contributing to GitHub projects
item.description: Lately I’ve been contributing to some open source projects hosted on github. I’m pretty new to git, and the process is a bit confusing for beginners. So, here’s a sample workflow, based on the The Foreman‘s foreman github repository. Note that I’m developing against the …
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: The state of Puppet External Node Classifiers
item.description: Update November 2013: This post has brought an amazing amount of traffic to my blog, probably because it still seems to be one of the only ENC comparisons out there. Both Dashboard (and Puppet Enterprise Console) and The Foreman have changed quite a bit since I wrote this. Foreman has …
